      static Double getExpectedSoftLabelCost(Map<String,Double> probabilities, Map<String,Category> categories)
      Gets as input a "soft label" (i.e., a distribution of probabilities over classes) and returns the expected cost of this soft label.
      static Double getMaxLikelihoodCost(Map<String,Double> probabilities, Map<String,Category> categories)
      Gets as input a "soft label" (i.e., a distribution of probabilities over classes) and returns the expected cost for the maximum likelihood label.

        Returns:
